column2: Skirmish Tactics
Develop weapons and tactics for light infantry and archers to better harass the enemy.
Melee Tactics
Develop weapons and tactics for heavy infantry and spearmen to better combat the enemy.
Cavalry Tactics
Develop weapons and tactics for all types and roles of horsemen to better decimate the enemy.
Principles of Defence
Improve the defence of the realm with more men to replace the guardians of the land as well as better defensive equipment for the men.
Call of Adventure
Encourage the men to join your host and march or sail to foreign lands to fight for glory and adventure.
Martial Professionalism
Study the exploits of the heroes of the past and apply lessons learned on combat tactics, and organization.
Feudalism
Push back the darkness of the past and modernize the nobility of your realm, and improve the agriculture of the land to support a larger population.
Urbanism
Push back the darkness of the past and modernize the merchant class of your realm like never before, and develop methods of improving your holdings more economically.
Ecclesiasticism
Push back the darkness of the past and modernize the clergy of your realm like never before, and benefit from their increased organization's wealth and education.
Fortifications
Build taller, deeper, stronger, and grander walls and castles to defend against the enemy, as well as better methods of resisting an enemy siege longer.
Trade and Commerce
Improve the flow of trade through your cities whether through land or sea, which also helps encourage the flow of coin within the realm.
Engineering
Discover new ways in the art of improving your holdings, and dismantling the enemy's walls, faster.
Martial Code
Build a chivalric tradition, glorifying the art of war, and rallying the men of the realm and the legitimacy of your rule.
Mercantile Code
Build a commercial tradition, praising the virtues of trade, and improving the wealth of the land.
Missionary Code
Build a clerical tradition, honoring the faith of the people and making the pople content.
Humanism
Glorify the majesty of the people and embrace other cultures into the fold more, putting the land at peace
Pluralism
Sponsor the spiritual arts and accept the people of other faiths, putting the land at peace
Divine Right
Prove your right to the seat of the land, pacifying dissidents and managing more directly.
Light Protection
Design better armour and defensive techniques for foot and mounted archers and light infantry and cavalry.
Heavy Protection
Design better armour and defensive formations for spearmen and heavy infantry and cavalry.
Offensive Strategems
Take the war towards the enemy's lands! Encourage the men to join your host and march or sail to fight for glory and adventure.
Defensive Strategems
Study techniques in improving the defensive capabilities of your realm, whether behind your stone-built walls or steel-clad host.
Agriculture
Improve the yield of the land, which frees up the peasants and allows them to learn to fight in their free time.
Education
Integrate the church more closely with your realm, which allows you to benefit from their coffers and libraries.
Engineering
Discover new ways in the art of improving your holdings, and dismantling your foe's walls, faster.
Fortifications
Build taller, deeper, stronger, and grander walls to protect your realm.
Secular Culture
Glorify the majesty of the people, improving the legitimacy of your rule.
column15: x #absorbed in tech_martial and tech_mercantile respectively

column2: Spiritual Culture
Sponsor the spiritual arts, making the people content.
